briefTitle: Study to Assess In-home Use of Evolocumab (AMG 145) Using a Prefilled Syringe or a Prefilled Autoinjector/Pen

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Fasting LDL-C at screening \> 85 mg/dL
* Fasting triglycerides less than or equal to 400 mg/dL (4.5 mmol/L) Exclusion Criteria:
* New York Heart Association (NYHA) III or IV heart failure
* Uncontrolled cardiac arrhythmia
* Uncontrolled hypertension
* Type 1 diabetes or poorly controlled type 2 diabetes
* Uncontrolled hypothyroidism or hyperthyroidism

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Participants With Full Administration of Evolocumab at Both Weeks 2 and 4
outcomeMeasures.description: Self-administration of evolocumab was assessed by a telephone interview at Weeks 2 and 4. Each participant was asked about all attempted injection(s) and if the injection was administered in part, full, or none at all.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change From Baseline in LDL-C at Week 6
